backend/main.mo: Defines an actor with a transform passthrough and an HTTPS-only link preview fetcher using OutCall.httpGetRequest.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing required updates to SelectedSignalsSection.tsx, including link changes and a new card.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend files, including updated link previews and new card details.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling all site sections with dark theme and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with quick links, social links, branding, smooth-scroll behavior, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/LinkPreview.tsx: Renders URL previews with loading, fallback, and rich preview states using useLinkPreview.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with smooth scrolling, scrolled-state styling, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioDetails: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About section with bio text and buttons to download a CV or view a portfolio.
frontend/src/components/sections/AskMyNa: Displays example prompts and a button that scrolls to the contact section for inquiries.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact form with validation, mailto submission, clipboard copying, and social/contact info.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, headline, subheadline, and CTA buttons that scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/MarketN: Shows topics of market notes and buttons to browse or subscribe.
frontend/src/components/sections/Selecte: Displays a grid of strategic work items with descriptions, link previews, and external links.
frontend/src/components/sections/Strateg: Lists key strategic transformations with titles and descriptions in a grid.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIBu: Presents capability categories describing narrative, GTM, and positioning work.
frontend/src/content/aboutContent.ts: Exports paragraph content used for the About section.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines static text content for site sections including hero, work, notes, about, and contact.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, storing identity and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinkPreview.ts: Fetches link preview data from the backend actor and parses metadata with React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for organizing React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables, dark mode, typography, scrollbar, and neon effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/contactMessage.ts: Utility to format contact form data into a simple message string.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features.
